00209   for (int i = 0; i < m_world->getNumberOfRioters(); i++)
00210   {
00211     ngl::Vec3 vecToRioter = m_world->getRioters()[i]->getPos() - m_pos;

00215     {

void Rioter::findTargetID ( float  _health  )  [virtual]

Method to find a target to pursue.

Find Target ID - find available target that has acceptable amount of health.

Parameters:
[in] _health,: the number to limit the search, if an agent is below this _health then it won't be found as a target
